channel.title: Free food from any drive thru
channel.description:
[b]Okay get in your car and go to the nearest drive thru
Wait there untill a car is behind you when it is
Go to the place to order and say something stupid like
'Is there any E454 or Glucose Saturates in your food'
They will reply as
'Im not sure ill have to ask someone''
You say
'Oh it dosent matter thanks anyway''
And dont drive away
Drive to the place you pick up your food stay just before there
Wait for the person behind you to order
Then pay
then you pick up there food
CASH BACK xD[/b]

item.title: Free food from any drive thru
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

they have cameras, thats how they see you. they will notice a giant Hummer from a smaller car.

Read full topic
item.source: Free food from any drive thru

item.title: Free food from any drive thru
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

it is possible it might work although there are some serious problems that could easily get you caught =… the only way i think this would work is if you go to a older fast food place that has 2 windows that are atleast 15-20 feet away from ea other then stop in the dead center…

Read full topic
item.source: Free food from any drive thru

item.title: Free food from any drive thru
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I think I know some of the ones you’re talking about The Un-Named but it mainly involves Pizza being the target, or it’s half eatin’ right? I only really know a few, and tried less than half of them. I’d rather lay out a couple bucks for a cheeseburger than get bitched at by a police officer.

The only one I can think of right now, is to demand to see the manager because the food is off, and as he goes to get the manager, run like you’ve never ran before. Obviously, you can’t use this method regularly or near your home town.

Read full topic
item.source: Free food from any drive thru

item.title: Free food from any drive thru
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

If you don't have nothing good to say - don't.
Double negatives :P Might want to revise that.

I’m assuming, Un-Named?

But I agree with him. Paying for your own food really isn’t that big of a deal… Just pay for it.

Read full topic
item.source: Free food from any drive thru

item.title: Free food from any drive thru
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:8, topic:140444”][quote author=bielby link=topic=192612.msg1732296#msg1732296 date=1188942158]
Then pay
[/quote]
Tell me, how is this “Free” ?[/quote]

Wait for them to pay.

Obviously this isn’t thought out, you should say your allergic to arachis hypogaea(the scientific name for nuts), and ask if they have it in their food, obviously they won’t know that it’s a common nut allergy, and drive off. This probably won’t work if they use cameras, or the person behind you tells them your there.

There are better ways to get free food.

Read full topic
item.source: Free food from any drive thru

item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

Just run by when they hand out the food and grab the bag, then run over the small embankment and hop in your friends car.

item.title: Free food from any drive thru
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Glucose saturates is meaningless. At least say something like polyunsaturated triglycerides. Or while you’re on carbohydrates, maybe something like N-acetylglucosamine.

And this red font is killing my eyes…please stop.
